title: 2 new cases of asymptomatic infection by overseas aviation in Yunnan;
Translated_Content: Beijing News Quick News According to the report of the Yunnan Health Committee, from 00:00 on September 28 to 24, there are no new local diagnosis cases and asymptomatic infections in our province; 2 cases of new overseas aviation input non -symptoms are in China, all of which are in China.The registered, including Uzbekistan and Indonesia input; 1 case in the province's overseas airlines input confirmed cases.As of 24:00 on September 28, there are 10 confirmed cases in our province and 24 asymptomatic infections.Added asymptomatic infection information: Anymal -free infection 1: Male, 30 years old, Chinese, working in Uzbekistan.Announced asymptomatic infection 2: Male, 28 years old, Chinese, working in Indonesia.The two people entered from Kunming Airport from Kunming Airport on September 19 from the Tashkeng and September 25 on September 19. The body temperature was normal when entering.During the observation period, the results of the two people's nucleic acids or serum antibody detection were positive, that is, the negative pressure ambulance was transferred to the designated medical institution to quarantine observation.The sampling review on the 28th, the test results were positive, and the expert diagnosed the asymptomatic infection of the new crown pneumonia (Uzbekistan input, Indonesia input).Other personnel of the same machine continue to focus on medical observation as required.Edit Jia Congcong wants to comment, read more exciting content, come and download the Beijing News Client, Sina.com | NetEase | Sohu | UC Headline | Xinhua.comLongwang | Shell Finance | Tencent.com | Baidu Business License Number: Beijing ICP Certificate No. 090533 | Beijing ICP No. 18053894 | Guoxin Office Network Word [2006] No. 7 | Radio and TV program production and operation license: (Beijing)Word No. 02592 | Jinggong.com Anmi 11010102004542 Regarding our copyright statement contact us job opportunity friendship link service agreement Copy Right Â© 2004-2020 www.bjnews.com.cn all rights reserved

title: Shijiazhuang Lucheng Education Bureau: fever diarrhea students diagnosed with gastroenteritis, excluding new crown pneumonia;
Translated_Content: On September 29, the relevant situation of "acute gastroenteritis occurred" in the Education Bureau of Shijiazhuang, Shijiazhuang, Hebei.According to the report, from September 25th to 26th, some students in Boshi Elementary School in Tancheng District had symptoms such as fever, vomiting, and diarrhea.The school was sent to the hospital for treatment as soon as possible.The education department immediately conducted a comprehensive investigation and organized three classes of the school to go to the hospital for testing and screening.After batch nucleic acid testing, the new coronary pneumonia infection is excluded.At present, 10 students who still have symptoms have improved significantly after active treatment.Expert diagnosis is acute gastroenteritis.After the incident, the district committee and the district government quickly transferred the hard work, set up a special work class, organized experts to treat it carefully, and are currently carrying out the survey of the diseased source as required.(This article comes from surging news. For more original information, please download the "Surging News" APP) Back to Sohu, see more responsible editors:

title: Update on the outbreak of new coronavirus pneumonia as of 24 hours on 3 October;
Translated_Content: At 0-24 o'clock on October 3rd, 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 16 newly confirmed cases, all of which were overseas input cases (6 cases in Guangdong, 3 cases in Sichuan, 2 cases in Yunnan, Shaanxi 2Example, 1 case of Tianjin, 1 case in Shanghai, and 1 case of Guangxi); there are no new death cases; 3 cases of suspected cases are added, all of which are overseas input cases (both in Shanghai).10 cases of newly cured hospitals on the day, 272 close contacts of medical observations were lifted, and severe cases were the same as the previous day.There were 195 existing confirmed cases overseas (1 of them), and 7 cases of suspected cases.A total of 2901 confirmed cases, 2,706 cases of accumulatively cured hospitalization, and no death cases.As of 24:00 on October 3rd, according to the reports of 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there were 195 confession cases (1 of them), 80,621 cases of accumulatively cured cases, and 4,634 cumulative death cases.A total of 8,5450 confirmed cases were reported, and there were 7 cases of suspected cases.A total of 83,5190 people were tracked to close contact, and 7,439 close contacts who were still observed in medical observations.31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 26 cases of asymptomatic infection (all inputs overseas input); 5 cases were converted to confirmed cases on the day;Both are overseas input); 366 cases of observation of asymptomatic infection are still observed (364 cases were entered overseas).A total of 5,671 confirmed cases were notified in Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.Among them, 5,108 cases of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (4,849 cases were discharged from hospital, 105 deaths), 46 cases of 46 cases of Macau Special Administrative Region (46 cases were discharged), and 517 cases in Taiwan (484 were discharged from hospital and 7 deaths).

title: Announcement of Jilin Provincial Health Commission on the epidemic situation of new coronavirus pneumonia (announced on September 19, 2020)
There is a new infection, Qingdao in China will conduct Covid-19 tests throughout the city
Translated_Content: Source: Reuters |Editor: Herlina Kartika Dewi Kontan.co.id - Shanghai.The city of Qingdao in China said that he did a COVID-19 test for the entire population of more than 9 million people for five days after new cases emerged in relation to hospitals that treat infection cases originating from outside (imports).Quoting Reuters on Monday (12/10), Qingdao reported six new Covid-19 cases and six asymptomatic cases until October 11.Most cases are related to Qingdao Dada Hospital.Calculation of the National Health Commission (NHC) from 21 Covid-19 cases confirmed in mainland China for October 11 was published after the Qingdao announcement, but did not include confirmed infections in the city.The number of new asymptomatic cases, which was not counted by China as a confirmed case, rose to 32 out of 23 cases the day before, NHC said.The number of cases did not specify where asymptomatic cases were only reported, although it was said that 29 of this case were imported infections.Also Read: Xi Jinping Intensively Promotion of Traditional Chinese Medicine, What Is That?Covid-19 infections daily in mainland China have dropped dramatically from its peak earlier this year, but the country remains high alert to prevent lockdown which causes the second largest economic direct contraction in the world.Qingdao has joked the Qingdao chest hospital and the emergency department of the central hospital.The building where the infected person lives has also been locked as part of the virus detention.The total number of Covid-19 cases confirmed in mainland China now reaches 85,578, while the number of deaths remains unchanged at 4,634.Next: Keep the distance is still lacking, this is the level of community compliance in the health protocol
